pullrequest.title: Refactor tests to use models from world file instead of dynamically spawning models

content.raw:
Also this dramatically speeds up the friction test `PhysicsEngines/PhysicsFrictionTest.BoxDirectionRing/0`:

* before: [takes 13 seconds](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/145/testReport/junit/(root)/PhysicsEngines_PhysicsFrictionTest/BoxDirectionRing_0/)
* after: [takes 2.8 seconds](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/138/testReport/(root)/PhysicsEngines_PhysicsFrictionTest/BoxDirectionRing_0)
content.html:
Also this dramatically speeds up the friction test PhysicsEngines/PhysicsFrictionTest.BoxDirectionRing/0:

  • before: takes 13 seconds
  • after: takes 2.8 seconds
